price: Sε Yεpε nso a anka Yεbεsesa wͻn wͻ wͻn tebea mu (ama wͻn adane tesε mmoa anaasε biribi) a wͻntumi nkeka wͻn ho na (wͻn nkͻ nso) wͻmma.
arabic: وَلَوۡ نَشَآءُ لَمَسَخۡنَٰهُمۡ عَلَىٰ مَكَانَتِهِمۡ فَمَا ٱسۡتَطَٰعُواْ مُضِيّٗا وَلَا يَرۡجِعُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: walaw nashāu lamasakhnāhum ʿalā makānatihim famā is'taṭāʿū muḍiyyan walā yarjiʿūna
